remarks: Member of subspace sum of spans of singletons.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2015.)
statement:
lsmspsn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lsmspsn.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lsmspsn.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lsmspsn.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lsmspsn.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lsmspsn.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lsmspsn.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lsmspsn.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lsmspsn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lsmspsn.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lsmspsn $p |- ( ph -> ( U e. ( ( N ` { X } ) .(+) ( N ` { Y } ) ) <-> E. j e. K E. k e. K U = ( ( j .x. X ) .+ ( k .x. Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d .+ j k $.
$d .x. j k $.
$d F j k $.
$d K j k $.
$d N j k $.
$d U j k $.
$d V j k $.
$d W j k $.
$d X j k $.
$d Y j k $.
$d j k ph $.
